topic.title: Zero Talk in Italian
topic.body: Hi, would it be possible to create an Italian board too? I can see German, Polish, etc. boards already. Any advice on how to do it?

topic.title: avada 5 beta
topic.body: Anyone here that have access to the avada 5 beta/rc  version and would like to share the package?

topic.title: remove message from chat
topic.body:
So, assuming I'm the chat admin, how do I remove a message from the log? 

I tried editing <sitename>/data/users/<author>/data.json but the unwanted message is still there after signing and publishing the site

1_15zYrGJKfXo6XXU6rBUsuU3cTgpJkDuQYA.body: currently I can't download leaks from 28 to 35, could you check?

1_1Vy5x8HrbwRc2GM32GfZtpxdgoB5f34fd.body: I sent a 0mail to nofish, let's see what happens

A preliminary version of the italian zerotalk board is available here: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MxvDmGn5fipn7cyjXAMyMZPH3SyhwfZkw/
have fun
@sirenyc, already did that, thanks for your help : )
